entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -34.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
